tool_description: Searches the web for companies that match a given search term
name: Company Search
title: Company Search

api_list.name: CompanySearch
api_list.description: Searches the web for matching companies returning three values for each match, the "description",  "title",  and "url."

api_list.name: Server Alive Check
api_list.description: Checks that the server is up and running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://company-search1.p.rapidapi.com/serverAlive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "company-search1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://company-search1.p.rapidapi.com/serverAlive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "company-search1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
